name: 王耀德
objective: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.
schedule:
1:Introduction
2:Classical Transport Theory
3:Crystal Structures
4:Concept of Quantum Theory
5:Band Theory
6:Properties of Semiconductors
7:Properties of Thin Films
8:Midterm Exam
9:Vacuum Science
10:Vacuum Technology
11:Thin Film Process
12:Deposition Techniques
13:Deposition Techniques
14:Thin Film Analysis
15:Characterization of Thin Films
16:Special Topics
17:special Topics
18:Final Exam
materials:
Thin-Film Deposition, by Donald L. Smith
Materials Science of Thin Films, by Milton Ohring
